description: Two memories partially contradict â€” overlapping claims with some agreement and some conflict

data.knowledge: The API uses JSON for all request and response bodies. Content-Type is always application/json. TOML is used only for configuration files.

memories.summary: API uses JSON for all bodies, TOML only for config

data.knowledge: The API uses JSON for most endpoints but supports MessagePack for high-throughput batch endpoints. Content-Type negotiation selects the format.

memories.summary: API uses JSON for most endpoints, MessagePack for batch endpoints

expected_output.agreement: Both agree JSON is the primary API format
expected_output.conflict: mem-c10 says 'all' bodies are JSON; mem-c11 says batch endpoints use MessagePack
